title: Neymar: Huge transfer fee is no burden
description:
(4 Aug 2017) Neymar's first press conference with Paris Saint-Germain started in a room packed with reporters, photographers and TV crews.
The 25-year-old Brazilian was speaking at the Parc des Princes Stadium on Friday - a day after his 222 million-euro (262 million-US dollar) buy-out clause from Barcelona was activated.
PSG president Nasser Al-Khelaifi readily dismissed concerns about the club being in breach of football's financial regulations.
"Please, go and have coffee and don't worry about us - we are in good hands" said Al-Khelaifi.
Neymar felt that the huge transfer fee would not put extra pressure on him.
"I am happy - that is the most important thing. It is not a burden."
